function.description: Deploy Docker Compose services on a remote host via SSH.
function.name: infra.deploy_compose

compose_dir.description: Absolute path to the Docker Compose project directory on the remote host.

dry_run.description: If true, return the SSH command that would be executed without running it.

host.description: SSH host target (e.g. user@hostname or an SSH config alias).

pull_only.description: If true, only pull images without starting services.

services.description: List of service names to deploy. If null or empty, all services in the compose file are targeted.
